price: 122. Sima Nkolo waye aponaki ye mpe ayambaki tubela naye mpe akambaki ye.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
